Body:
I am trying to setup web browser on Windows 10 IoT with the sample app IoTBrowser (https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/iot/win10/samples/iotbrowser) - this uses simple WebView. It works fine in a simple network without proxy.

I have to use it in a corporate network
column9: so that a proxy setting is crucial. Is there a way to setup proxy for WebView without rewriting the app to HttpWebRequest? This would be problematic
column10:
as the app has to compile on ARM platform (for raspberry pi v3) and uses only Universal Windows SDK.

The apps purpose is to show a single web page without any navigation
column11:
so the simpler the solution is - the better.

"
